#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#define MAXSIZE 10000

using namespace std;

int main() {

	char *s;
	char **A;
	int i, j, k, m, count;

	s = new char[ MAXSIZE ];
	scanf("%[^.]s", s );

	count = 1;

	for( i = 0;s[ i ];i++)
		if( s[ i ] == ' ' )
			count++;
	
	A = new char*[ count + 1 ];
	for( i = 0; i < count;i++ )
		A[ i ] =  new char[ MAXSIZE ];

	j = 0;
	k = 0;

	for( i = 0;s[ i ];i++ ) {
		if( s[ i ] != ' ' )	{
			
			A[ j ][ k ] = s[ i ];
			k++;		
		}
		else {
			
			A[ j ][ k ] = '\0';
			j++;
			k = 0;		
		}
	}
	A[ j ][ k ] = '\0';

	for( i = 0;i <= j;i++ ) {

		for( m = strlen( A[ i ] ) - 1;m >= 0;m-- )
			printf("%c", A[ i ][ m ] );

		if( i == j )
			printf(".\n");
		else
		printf(" ");

	}

	for( i = 0; i < count;i++ )
		delete A[ i ];
	delete A;

	return 0;
}
